questions.question_text:
A company is implementing Dynamics 365 Finance.
The company wants to automate expense reports processing. The new process must provide visibility into all steps of the approval process.
You need to recommend a solution.
Which two solutions should you recommend? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.B: Use the Business process modeler (BPM) to create a business process flow.
choices.A: Use Microsoft Power Automate to create a workflow.
choices.C: Use the PowerApps platform to create a business process flow.
choices.D: Create a workflow that runs on Application Object Server (AOS).

HOTSPOT -
A mining company is upgrading their system to Dynamics 365 Finance and Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.
You need to determine which functionality of the Dynamics 365 suite meets each requirement.
Which functionality should you implement for each requirement? To answer, select the appropriate options from the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
second one is project management and accounting - investment projects
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/project-operations/prod-pma/overview-project-management-accounting
second one is project management and accounting

Capitalization opportunities: Means that the would-be asset is not capitalized. Fixed asset is valid only when the asset is capitalized. Hence, Project Mgt & accounting - Investment is the right answer.
Key word in the second question is "capture costs". Fixed assets is not used to capture cost, so the answer must be Project Management and Accounting.

A manufacturing company has multiple factories and distribution centers in remote areas where they have poor internet connectivity. The company is planning to implement Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.
The company's main priorities are uninterrupted factory and distribution center operations, master data management, financial global reporting, and integration with analytics tools.
You need to design the infrastructure.
Solution: Implement the manufacturing factories' operations and distribution center operations on-premises and the center data repository in the cloud.
Does the solution meet the goal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
MDM and financial global reporting can be implemented in the central data repository in the cloud. MDM can be redistributed to on-prem factory remote operations and data from on prem can be reintegrated on a periodic basis with center data repository

Selected Answer: B
I would have said "No" cause I think the solution is not enough and even data must be located on-premise. If you lose connectivity to your data, how can you work ?? Not possible
A is likely answer because company's main priority is uninterrupted operations with poor internet connectivity in remote areas.
